name: Tic tac toe (itch) (aznavor)
description: Tic Tac Toe is a simple but fun version of the classic tic tac toe game. Keeping the mechanics of the original game intact, our objective in Tic Tac Toe will be to compete against an artificial intelligence to become the first to manage to align three of our tiles. With an extremely simple and straightforward gameplay and with a minimalist and attractive visual aspect, Tic Tac Toe is presented as a very interesting alternative from which to play the classic board game on our mobile devices.
